Mod Troubleshooting & Tips

Troubleshooting

Flight did not download

Use Exception handling / Select aircraft type and meal services / If flight final is not received or is not matching the Pursers information then “Stop Sync” on KIS Hub Page and press “Replication Reset” button.

Note: Reports have to be written in detail in order for the IT Team to know the exact issue.

Zones missing on MOD

Use Exception handling / select aircraft type / In this case, the customer information will still be available and the cabin zones will be displayed.
Raise KIS report to: Product Development/JC/MOD

Note: Reports have to be written in detail in order for the IT Team to know the exact issue.

Services missing in the MOD

Go to Exception Handling menu in F&B Application. Click on the missing services on the flight. Click on ‘Edit Menus’. To edit menus follow steps on the next page.
Raise KIS report to: Catering/Food/Business Class/MOD incorrect

Note: Reports have to be written in detail in order for the IT Team to know the exact issue.

Menu Mismatch Food/Wines

Use Exception handling / Edit menus / Delete or rename an incorrect item, add a correct item and enter the description / Tap Publish.
Raise KIS report to Catering for menu discrepancies:

  1. Wines or Drinks: Catering/Loading/Business Class/Drinks not loaded MOD
  2. Food: Catering/Food/Business Class/MOD incorrect

Note: Reports have to be written in detail in order for the IT Team to know the exact issue.

UAECREW is not working on board the A380 aircraft

Check page on FAP to see potential failures of WIFI by pressing on MENU hard key on connectivity page.
The service and WLAN buttons should be green. If not , the Purser has to switch them on and inform the Captain.

If KiS tablets or MODs disconnect / orders are not being received / slow

Select the ‘Reset Connection’ icon next to the Wi-Fi symbol to refresh the connection.

If most of the MODs are disconnected

Close the F&B app ONLY from the Galley Tablet and launch it again. Do not close the APP from the MOD during service as you risk losing the orders.

Sync function status on the KiS App – ON / OFF

This affects the link between devices after take off, if it is kept “ON” during the flight.
In regard to the receiving the Passenger Baggage information, Pursers are advised to turn the “Sync” function back “ON” around 70% into the flight in order to receive this information and after go back to “OFF”.

Tips on usage of MOD

Use of ‘All services’ button on Galley view

Where the appetiser and main course is served together on the meal tray use ‘ALL SERVICES’ option on both KiS tablet and MOD to view both and the customers requested drink.
Ensure to place the HB or drinks orders i.e. port and champagne under the DCF order, you can place multiple drink orders. i.e.Cat 2/3 flights ‘ALL SERVICES’ may also be useful when delivering DCF-HBL, if a drink order is taken on a separate page.This will avoid missing customers drink orders.

  • MOD must be used during DFC / Wecare.
  • The Catering will be loaded based on usage statistics extracted from the Data Base.
    •
